label: Train Cabin 1
description:
John shouts "Hey!" to the little man, who then sharply looks at him and grins before running to the cabin door, kicking it open.
The little man then messes with a little device simliar to what he put on the wall, and the cabin starts to spin as the little man with the woman jumps out.
John falls and blacks out.

Hit 1 to continue.

Hit 0 to quit.
